name: Remainders of the 34
description:
Description

Game made as entry for Ludum Dare 34. We focused on the theme Two button controls.

The sound and music made by @parejoMusic are really great, and we found some cool ways to implement some of it, so please pay attention to it :)


Controls

Left and right arrows to activate each engine of the ship (both to fly off a bit).


Story
